means: 教条主义学派；公式主义学派

sentence.Network_en: In his manner was something of the dogmatist.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他身上有一种独断专行的派头.

sentence.Network_en: To oppose the subjectivist, one - sided approach to problems, we must demolish dogmatist subjectiveness and one - sidedness .
sentence.Network_cn: 我们反对主观地 片面 地看问题, 必须攻破教条主义的主观性和 片面性.

sentence.Network_en: I think you as a contented dogmatist , had better leave me alone has become of yours.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想你这么一个欣然自足,专好武断的人, 顶好不必管我,还是先考查考查你自己好啦.

PerfectNetExp.abs: dogmatism 独断dogmatist 独断家dogmatize 独断
stability 稳定dogmatist 教条主义者disciplined 训练有素的
antagonist 敌手dogmatist 武断的人表示相信某学说的人,或致力于某学科.

those with book learing must develop in the direction of practice ; it is only in this way that they will stop being content with books and avoid committing dogmatist errors .有书本知识的人向实际方面发展，然后才可以不停止在书本上，才可以不犯教条主义的错误。

list.abs: the departure point of dealing with the three relations is to completely discard the dogmatist thinking way .处理这三大关系的根本出发点是彻底抛弃教条主义的思维方式。

those with book learing must develop in the direction of practice ; it is only in this way that they will stop being content with books and avoid committing dogmatist errors .有书本知识的人向实际方面发展，然后才可以不停止在书本上，才可以不犯教条主义的错误。

entry.def: If you refer to an opinion as dogmatism, you are criticizing it for being strongly stated without considering all the relevant facts or other people's opinions.

example.ex: We cannot allow dogmatism to stand in the way of progress.
example.tran: 我们不能允许教条主义阻碍进步。

means.word_mean: 1. a stubborn person of arbitrary or arrogant opinions

auth_sentence.content: You wear you faith as much on your sleeve as does any dogmatist.
auth_sentence.res_content: You wear you faith as much on your sleeve as does any dogmatist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You wear you faith as much on your sleeve as does any dogmatist.
